description:
Scree, glacier ice, rugged mountain terrain… the Sirius II GTX thrives on it. This fully crampon-compatible, high-alpine boot protects your feet with its solid, durable construction and provides good insulation to keep them warm. The high rubber rand provides an additional layer of protection on top of the already highly robust, thick split leather upper. And the waterproof, breathable Gore-Tex lining keeps out snow, slush and rain.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Sirius II GTX - Mens
